title: Dena Home Pavilion All Purpose Bowl, White, Set of 4
features: Use For all sorts of serving needs; side dishes, nuts or desserts
Use everyday or for special occasions
description: Pavilion White tableware is hand crafted and designed by Dena Home. The collection features unusual shapes and deeply embossed hand painted detail whose beauty is enhanced by the milky white background. Inspired by the fresh flowers that bloom every spring, master designer, Dena Fishbein' s intent was to bring a sense of freshness, that comes with each season, to the tabletop . The ware is fashioned from high fired durable earthenware to insure long term use and a lifetime of service. Perfect for everyday, all pieces can go in the dishwasher or microwave for easy care. Ideal for more formal occasions as well, Pavilion can be "dressed up" by accessorizing with more formal stemware and flatware and works with any table linens. This fun versatile server has thousands of uses and is the ideal, hard to find size for that special side dish or treat. Unique shape is the perfect "canvas" for this go anywhere neutral, design. Use for desserts, vegetables, side dishes, appetizers and sauces, nuts and candy.
